title: Does reciting Quran loudly or silently but moving lips have the same reward? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: akbar from india he says if we were to recite the quran loudly or silently but without moving with moving the lips would the reward be the same the answer is yes if you recite it loudly or silently while moving your lips and tongue the reward is the same insha allah as long as nobody is listening you
